docs.snippet: A Queens man claimed to specialize in overturning wrongful convictions. He took people’s money, prosecutors said, but never did the legal work.

headline.print_headline: Indictment Alleges Queens Man Defrauded Convicts, Exploiting Hopes for Release
headline.main: Swindler Exploits the ‘Hope of Inmates,’ Prosecutor Says

docs.snippet: A new study finds that the vast majority of students strongly support free speech but struggle to balance it with their desire for inclusivity.

headline.main: What College Students Really Think About Free Speech

docs.snippet: When Campbell Robertson set out to find why black worshipers were leaving white-majority churches, he recalled the little Baptist church he grew up in.

headline.print_headline: At the Crossroads of Church and Race, a Reporter Glimpses His Childhood
headline.main: At the Crossroads of Church and Race, a Reporter Glimpses His Childhood

docs.snippet: The nation’s adults must listen to the students walking out of their schools Wednesday to protest gun violence.
The living history museum has stayed true to its roots while adding immersive activities that have increased attendance.

headline.print_headline: Bringing the Past Into the Present
headline.main: At Hancock Shaker Village, Concerts, a Farm-to-Table Menu and Goat Yoga

docs.snippet: Andy Richter photographed around the world to present a diverse look at an ancient practice.
Marketers are increasingly concerned that too many of the influencers they pay to push their products are actually followed by a percentage of accounts that are fake.

headline.print_headline: Marketers At Last Reckon With the Bots
headline.main: Uncovering Instagram Bots With a New Kind of Detective Work

docs.snippet: Posters at some American and overseas universities are opposing plans to erase term limits for China’s president, a rare show of protest among Chinese students.

headline.print_headline: Some Chinese Students Protest Xi’s Control Move
headline.main: Far From Home and Censors, Some Chinese Students Protest Xi’s Power Move

docs.snippet: The cocktail world is rediscovering a juice that was largely sidelined to the tiki bar.

headline.print_headline: Pineapple, a Spiky Outsider, Is Now a Regular at the Bar
headline.main: Pineapple, a Spiky Outsider, Is Now a Regular at the Bar

docs.snippet: The deaths of two children crossing a busy street in Brooklyn suggest that the war on pedestrian fatalities is really a war against unfit motorists.

headline.print_headline: Reckless Driving and the Limits of Vision Zero
headline.main: Reckless Driving and the Limits of Vision Zero
